testcase.classname: Successful login to Admin portal and add a new product
testcase.name: Login, add a new product, search product, add to cart, and checkout - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given Admin is on the login page............................................passed When Admin enters valid email "admin@shophub.com" and password "admin123"...passed And Admin clicks the login button...........................................passed Then Admin should be redirected to the home page............................passed When Admin clicks on the Admin panel........................................passed And Admin adds a new product with name "Bluetooth Mouse"....................passed And Admin selects category "Electronics" and enters price "499".............passed And Admin enters initial stock "20" and product description "Wireless optical mouse".passed Then Admin clicks the Add Product button....................................passed Then Admin click the all Products section...................................passed When Admin clicks on the search bar.........................................passed And Admin types "Bluetooth Mouse" into the search bar.......................passed And clicks the search button................................................passed Then Products related to "Bluetooth Mouse" should be displayed..............passed When User clicks "Add to Cart" on a displayed product.......................passed Then The product should be added to the shopping cart.......................passed When User clicks on the cart icon...........................................passed Then The cart summary should display the added product with the correct price.passed When User clicks the Checkout button........................................passed Then User should be redirected to the checkout page.........................passed Then User click the Logout button...........................................passed

testcase.classname: Successful login to Admin portal and add a new product
testcase.name: Login, Open Admin Panel, and Edit Existing Products - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given Admin is on the login page............................................passed When Admin enters valid email "admin@shophub.com" and password "admin123"...passed And Admin clicks the login button...........................................passed Then Admin should be redirected to the home page............................passed When Admin clicks on the Admin panel........................................passed Then Admin clicks on the Existing Products section..........................passed And Admin see the "Sony WH-1000XM5" list and clicks the edit icon...........passed Then Admin enters updated stock value "65"..................................passed And clicks the update button................................................passed Then A success notification should be displayed.............................passed Then User click the Logout button...........................................passed

testcase.classname: Successful login to Admin portal and add a new product
testcase.name: Login, Open Admin Panel, and Delete Existing Products - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given Admin is on the login page............................................passed When Admin enters valid email "admin@shophub.com" and password "admin123"...passed And Admin clicks the login button...........................................passed Then Admin should be redirected to the home page............................passed When Admin clicks on the Admin panel........................................passed Then Admin clicks on the Existing Products section..........................passed And Admin see "Dell Monitor 27"" list and clicks the delete icon,and a confirmation popup appears.passed When Admin confirms the deletion............................................passed Then A success notification should be displayed stating the product was deleted.passed Then User click the Logout button...........................................passed

testcase.name: Unsuccessful login attempt with invalid credentials - #1.1

failure.message: Login failed. Expected success, but got failure.

testcase.failure: java.lang.AssertionError: Login failed. Expected success, but got failure. at page.LoginPage.checkLoginOutcome(LoginPage.java:74) at stepdefinitions.LoginSteps.user_should_be_redirected_to_the_home_page(LoginSteps.java:59) at ✽.User should be redirected to the home page(file:///C:/Users/seeni/IdeaProjects/ShopHub/src/main/resources/Features/Login-Negative.feature:8)
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the login page.............................................passed When User enters invalid email "user@example.com" and password "user12".....passed And clicks the login button.................................................passed Then User should be redirected to the home page.............................failed

testcase.name: Valid login but product not found in search - #1.1

failure.message: Product 'vivo' was found but should not be displayed.

testcase.failure: java.lang.AssertionError: Product 'vivo' was found but should not be displayed. at org.junit.Assert.fail(Assert.java:89) at page.HomePage.displayed_product(HomePage.java:70) at stepdefinitions.LoginSteps.products_related_to_should_not_be_displayed(LoginSteps.java:96) at ✽.Products related to "vivo" should not be displayed(file:///C:/Users/seeni/IdeaProjects/ShopHub/src/main/resources/Features/Login-Negative.feature:23)

testcase.classname: Successful Shopping Journey for User and Guest User
testcase.name: User successfully creates a new account with valid details
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the Create New Account page................................passed When User enters a valid "First Name" and "last Name".......................passed And User enters a valid email "Email Address"...............................passed And User enters a valid password "Password".................................passed And User enters the same "Password" in the Confirm Password field...........passed Then User enters a valid Number "Phone Number"..............................passed And User agrees to the Terms and Conditions.................................passed And User clicks on the Create Account button................................passed Then A success message Account created successfully should be displayed.....passed And User should be redirected to the login page.............................passed
